content: **this design is a premium pattern a free version of this pattern is also available on my blog the paid premium version offers a tidy and neatly formatted pdf digital download that is ad-free and printer friendly ** > you are very welcome to join the sweet > bee crochet community connect with > other crocheters and find inspiration > for your next project click > here 1 after a few requests i m happy to share a new larger version of my suzette hook pouch the original design here 2 is perfectly lovely for stashing away a one to two hooks but there s room for more in the larger version the pattern uses the same pretty suzette stitch and works wonderfully to keep your crochet hooks together in your project bag **inside the pattern you will find ** - detailed written instructions us terms - clear photos - special stitch tutorials - required tools approximate yardage required **materials needed ** - approximately 96 yards of worsted weight yarn i used wecrochet brava - 5mm hook - yarn needle - scissors - measuring tape - one 16mm button - needle and thread appropriate for sewing on the button ***this pattern has been tested so you can feel confident in your purchase please note this is a digital file and not a finished product there will be no refunds on digital products *** 1 https //www facebook com/groups/sweetbeecrochet 2 https //sweetbeecrochet com/suzette-hook-pouch/
